attributes.action: Republic of China (Taiwan) denies the Britain-Sino junctional declaration, for the rescue of HK
attributes.additional_details:
Once British HK was forced to be untruthfully regressed to the China, HK have to bear the big notorieties of Chinese HK globally from 1 July, 1997. In this range, the Chinese communist party (CCP) has had the united fronts to the politics, economics and entertainments in HK; Plus the more times of hardship and social unrests.
On the other hand, the declaration has just been agreed by the Marx-Lenin descendants, instead of genuine Chinese ethnic groups, has become the new suffering for the Chinese persons.
Thus I am highly recommending the Taiwanese government, once you came back mainland China after CCP was disintergrated, handing over HK to Britain for atonement from China.
